summary: A cute, romantic, single-page website dedicated to Ananya, built with HTML/CSS/JS. Pastel-themed (pink, lavender, cream, peach) with smooth animations, handwritten + serif fonts, and responsive design. Includes: loading screen, hero section with popup, love cards grid, future timeline, interactive love counter, password-protected secret message (with long poetic message), footer, a new 'Our Little Comparison ü§ç' section with arms photo. Background music feature has been removed.

Typography: handwritten font + elegant serif mix
Fully responsive for mobile and desktop

existing_features.title: Apply a cohesive pastel visual theme across the entire app: soft pink (#FFB7C5), lavender (#C9B8E8), cream (#FFF8F0), and baby peach (#FFDAB9) color palette. Use a mix of a handwritten Google Font (e.g. 'Dancing Script') and an elegant serif (e.g. 'Playfair Display') for typography. All UI elements must feel romantic, classy, and modern ‚Äî not childish. The design must be fully responsive for mobile and desktop.

Implement a full-screen loading screen that displays the text 'Preparing something special for Ananya‚Ä¶' with a soft animated heart or sparkle. It should fade out smoothly after 2‚Äì3 seconds and reveal the main page.

Build the Hero section as the first visible section after the loading screen. Include: a large heading 'For My Ananya ü§ç', a subheading 'Made with love by Viaan', an animated background with floating hearts or soft glowing particles, and a glowing button labeled 'Click if you love me'. When the button is clicked, show a cute modal/popup with the message 'Too late, you're already mine forever üíç' and a close button.

Build the 'Things I Love About You' section as a responsive grid of 6 romantic cards. Each card displays one of the following lines: 'Your smile', 'The way you say "pagal"', 'Your hugs', 'The way you get jealous', 'Your soft voice', 'The calm I feel with you'. Each card must have a soft hover animation (e.g. slight lift/glow/scale). Cards should use pastel backgrounds with soft shadows.

Build the 'Our Future' section as a vertical timeline layout with the following milestones in order: 'More school memories', 'Cute little dates', 'Cooking dosa for you', 'Late night calls', 'Matching outfits', 'Marriage üíç'. Each milestone should have a small icon or heart marker. Add a subtle sparkle or twinkle CSS animation to the timeline items.

Build the 'Interactive Love Counter' section. Display the heading 'How much do I love you?', a glowing button that increments a counter number by 1 each time it is clicked (no upper limit), and the static text 'Still not enough.' below the counter. The number should update in real-time using React state.

Build the 'Secret Message' section with a password-protected reveal. Show a password input field and a hint text 'What do you call me?'. When the user enters the correct password (case-insensitive), hide the input and reveal a heartfelt paragraph: 'You are only mine, Ananya. No matter where life takes us, I will always choose you ‚Äî today, tomorrow, and every day after. You are my calm, my happiness, and my home. Forever and always, only yours. üíç'. If the wrong password is entered, show a gentle error message like 'Hmm, try again ü•∫'.
Build the footer section. Display the text 'Forever yours, Viaan.' in an elegant font. Add a small looping floating heart animation in the footer.

Add a soft background music toggle button (fixed position, top-right or bottom-right corner). The button should display a musical note icon or üéµ emoji. Clicking it toggles autoplay of a romantic instrumental audio track. Use a royalty-free audio file hosted as a static asset (frontend/public/assets/music.mp3) or a CDN-hosted public domain track URL. The button should have a glowing/pulsing animation when music is playing.

Implement smooth scroll behavior for the entire page. Add subtle micro-interactions on all interactive buttons: slight scale-up on hover, soft glow or shadow pulse on click. All section transitions should use fade-in animations as they enter the viewport (intersection observer or CSS animation on scroll).

Update the SecretMessageSection component so that the password check accepts any of the following values (case-insensitive): 'baby', 'bobo', 'gugi', 'jaanu', 'pati', 'darling', 'pagal', 'mine', 'viaanu'. Remove the previous single-password check ('viaan') and replace it with a check against this list. All other behavior (reveal animation, error message, hint text) must remain unchanged.

Use the uploaded image (pic.jpeg ‚Äî two arms side by side) as the photo displayed in the 'Our Little Comparison ü§ç' section. Save it as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/comparison.jpg and render it inside the existing soft rounded frame with subtle shadow and hover zoom animation already specified for that section.
